comments:
I followed Tyler Anderson's article steps to develop a web service using STP in Eclipse. The web service is running well in the eclipse environment. However, after the web service is deployed into Tomcat V5.5 and I run the client application in the Eclipse, I got the following error message on the client side as 

Jun 29, 2007 11:30:43 AM org.apache.cxf.service.factory.ReflectionServiceFactoryBean initializeServiceModel
INFO: Creating Service {http://scicalc.dw.ibm.com/}ScientificCalculatorService from WSDL.
Exception in thread "main" org.apache.cxf.service.factory.ServiceConstructionException: Failed to create service.
	at org.apache.cxf.wsdl11.WSDLServiceFactory.<init>(WSDLServiceFactory.java:62)
	at org.apache.cxf.service.factory.ReflectionServiceFactoryBean.initializeServiceModel(ReflectionServiceFactoryBean.java:174)
	at org.apache.cxf.service.factory.ReflectionServiceFactoryBean.create(ReflectionServiceFactoryBean.java:116)
	at org.apache.cxf.jaxws.ServiceImpl.createPort(ServiceImpl.java:240)
	at org.apache.cxf.jaxws.ServiceImpl.getPort(ServiceImpl.java:200)
	at javax.xml.ws.Service.getPort(Unknown Source)
	at com.ibm.dw.scicalc.ScientificCalculatorService.getScientificCalculatorPort(ScientificCalculatorService.java:67)
	at com.ibm.dw.scicalc.ScientificCalculatorClient.main(ScientificCalculatorClient.java:65)
Caused by: javax.wsdl.WSDLException: WSDLException: faultCode=OTHER_ERROR: Unable to locate document at 'http://localhost:8080/ScientificCalculator/services/ScientificCalculatorService?wsdl'.
	at com.ibm.wsdl.xml.WSDLReaderImpl.readWSDL(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.cxf.wsdl11.WSDLManagerImpl.loadDefinition(WSDLManagerImpl.java:165)
	at org.apache.cxf.wsdl11.WSDLManagerImpl.getDefinition(WSDLManagerImpl.java:116)
	at org.apache.cxf.wsdl11.WSDLServiceFactory.<init>(WSDLServiceFactory.java:60)

and following message on the server log file as

Jun 29, 2007 11:30:43 AM org.apache.cxf.jaxws.servlet.ServletController invoke
WARNING: Can't find the the request forhttp://localhost/services/ScientificCalculatorService 's Observer 

Here is web service structure on the Tomcat server
wepapps/ScientificCalculator/
                             META-INF
                             WEB-INF/
                                      classes/
                                      wsdl/
                                      celtix-servlet.xml
                                      web.xml

Here is the content of celtix-servlet.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<endpoints>
<endpoint
    name="ScientificCalculator"
    interface="com.ibm.dw.scicalc.ScientificCalculator"
    implementation="com.ibm.dw.scicalc.ScientificCalculatorImpl"
    wsdl="WEB-INF/wsdl/com/ibm/dw/scicalc/ScientificCalculator.wsdl"
    service="{http://scicalc.dw.ibm.com/}ScientificCalculatorService"
    port="{http://scicalc.dw.ibm.com/}ScientificCalculatorPort"
    url-pattern="/ScientificCalculator" />
</endpoints>

Here is content of web.xml
<!DOCTYPE web-app PUBLIC "-//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD Web Application 2.3//EN" "http://java.sun.com/dtd/web-app_2_3.dtd">
<web-app>
    <display-name>cxf</display-name>
    <description>cxf</description>
    <servlet>
        <servlet-name>cxf</servlet-name>
        <display-name>cxf</display-name>
        <description>Apache CXF Endpoint</description>
        <servlet-class>org.apache.cxf.jaxws.servlet.CXFServlet</servlet-class>
        <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
    </servlet>
    <servlet-mapping>
        <servlet-name>cxf</servlet-name>
        <url-pattern>/services/*</url-pattern>
    </servlet-mapping>
    <session-config>
        <session-timeout>60</session-timeout>
    </session-config>
</web-app>

The CXF runtime environment is cxf-2.0-incubator-M1

The article didn't say after deployment whether I need to reconfig Tomcat configuration files or not. It looks like the client should be running as before without any update on Tomcat. Please advise.  Thanks a lot.

I think the cxf you used is old version.
Please reference the wiki [1] to get latest stp and cxf stuff, setup your env according to it, then try Tyler's article. 

Thanks 


[1]http://wiki.eclipse.org/STP_Service_Creation_getting_started

Hello,

Can you confirm you tried this bug with the latest version of CXF? If this is still an issue we can prioritize the task and ensure this is fixed. 

Will close on Dec 15th if on confirmation received back.

Adrian.

causedBy.message: faultCode=OTHER_ERROR: Unable to locate document at 'http://localhost:8080/ScientificCalculator/services/ScientificCalculatorService?wsdl'.
